synopsis.text: Mizuki Ashiya, a talented Japanese-American track star, transfers to an all-boys high school in Japan to get close to her idol, high jumper Izumi Sano. By disguising herself as a boy, Mizuki manages to become Izumi's roommate. She now faces the challenges of keeping her true gender a secret from her classmates and even Izumi while trying to help him overcome personal issues. As Mizuki and Izumi grow closer, romantic feelings develop between them. Mizuki must also continue hiding her identity from the school, including the observant school nurse who suspects something is amiss. Through supporting each other, Mizuki and Izumi form a meaningful bond despite obstacles in their way. This lighthearted story covers themes of identity, compassion, and young love as Mizuki risks everything to achieve her dreams of being close to her idol and helping him reach his full potential. With humor and heart, their lives become intertwined in ways neither expected.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
